school_name: Montgomery College: Takoma Park/Silver Spring Campus
comments: if you decided to take this class make sure you patient because she is very slower teacher. she grade so hard and you must take this class very serious. she doesn\'t play around. homework every day and quiz every Friday. be prepare to learn, if you want to pass her class. Good luck

school_name: Montgomery College: Takoma Park/Silver Spring Campus
comments: Prof. Mandel is an amazing professor. I am so glad I took her class because she taught me how to be a good writer. She can be tough, but by the end of her class, you will gain a great deal of knowledge all about rules of grammar and essay writing. I would recommend anyone to take her class because I learned a lot and you will too.
